title: Debug and fix non-functional frontend

requirements.text: Investigate and fix all frontend runtime errors preventing the application from loading or functioning correctly

quotes: But still app is not working, recheck its frontend

acceptanceCriteria: No React rendering errors or hooks violations

requirements.text: Verify Internet Identity authentication flow works correctly and user can log in
acceptanceCriteria: Login button triggers Internet Identity authentication
User identity is properly stored and persisted

requirements.text: Ensure the actor initialization and backend communication is working properly
acceptanceCriteria: Actor is initialized with correct canister ID
Query hooks properly fetch and cache data

requirements.text: Verify the Integrity & Session State section renders correctly for investor users with session buffer hashes and SessionState record
acceptanceCriteria: Session buffer displays up to 6 transaction hashes
Last SessionState record shows previousStateHash, sessionBufferHash, and timestamp
Section is visible only to INVESTOR role users

requirements.text: Check for any missing dependencies, import errors, or build configuration issues that prevent the frontend from running

constraints: Do not modify backend logic or data models
Preserve existing authentication flow with Internet Identity
Maintain the current component structure and routing setup
nonGoals: Changing the UI design or styling
Modifying backend endpoints or actor methods
